entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.38.6
entry.content:
BREAKING CHANGE ‚ö†Ô∏è

Please read the following If you have separated the workers in their own servers: Breaking Changes Documentation

üß© Pieces

  • fix(google-sheets): issue with finding sheets when id is text not number (#6452) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: check if git_repo table exists before dropping mapping column (#6455) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix(google-sheets): issue with finding sheets when id is text not number (#6452) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: add default value action (#6450) @Anmol-Gup

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add amrabuaza as a contributor for plugin (#6453) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @Anmol-Gup, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot] and @hazemadelkhalel

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.39.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: add billing for the platform on cloud (#6466) @amrabuaza

üß© Pieces

  • feat(matrix): enable markdown formatting (#6473) @revolunet
  • fix(Perplexity): Add citations to "Ask AI" action output (#6493) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • feat(supadata): Get Transcript Action (#6479) @rafalzawadzki
  • fix: use date and time regardless of time zone for tasks (#6474) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(spotify): spotify offset labels (#6461) @jerboa88
  • feat(spotify): get saved tracks action (#6463) @jerboa88

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: duplicated flows are now put in their source folder (#6490) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: rename connection button in connections table + branch label wasn't being updating after it was edited in step settings (#6482) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: copying text from step output (#6489) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: auto retry on worker failure (#6495) @abuaboud
  • feat: switch to child_process instead of worker threads (#6491) @abuaboud
  • chore: add global error handler (#6481) @abuaboud
  • fix: ai tokens billing (#6478) @abuaboud
  • fix: Hubspot piece crashing the app (#6475) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: use date and time regardless of time zone for tasks (#6474) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: casting the mapping in externalId migration (#6472) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: email is no longer required in embedding (#6467) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: support creating a project release using an api key (#6494) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: move billing to setup (#6468) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add jerboa88 as a contributor for plugin (#6464) @allcontributors
  • feat: support creating a project release using an api key (#6494) @hazemadelkhalel

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • chore: merge init & start in one function (#6487) @abuaboud
  • refactor: new authentication to move each user on cloud to their own platform (#6432) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @amrabuaza, @hazemadelkhalel, @jerboa88, @kishanprmr, @rafalzawadzki and @revolunet
